summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2007 PONTIAC G6. WHILE DRIVING IN REVERSE AT APPROXIMATELY 2 MPH, THE POWER STEERING FAILED WITHOUT WARNING. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALER. THE TECHNICIAN DIAGNOSED THAT THE POWER STEERING PUMP AND BELT NEEDED TO BE REPLACED. THE STEERING RESERVOIR WAS REPLACED PREVIOUSLY DUE TO A LEAK. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 101,318.
